{{- $json := "" }} {{- $skin := "model/base/scripts.json" }} {{- $core := "_core/model/base/scripts.json" }} {{- if resources.Get $skin -}} {{- $json = $skin -}} {{- else -}} {{- $json = $core -}} {{- end -}} {{- with resources.Get $json -}} {{- $conf := . | transform.Unmarshal -}} {{- if and ( eq hugo.IsDevelopment true ) ( eq $conf.ven.tailwind true ) -}} {{- end -}} {{- end -}}
